channel.title: Comments on: Fudge Covered Ritz Crackers

item.title: By: jeff
item.dc:creator: jeff
item.description: LOVED THEM! PLEEEEEZ BRING THEM BACK!!!!!

item.title: By: nan
item.dc:creator: nan
item.description: I try your Fudge covered ritz thay are great please bring them to Elpaso texas.
item.content:encoded: I try your Fudge covered ritz thay are great please bring them to Elpaso texas.

item.title: By: Michele Gardas
item.dc:creator: Michele Gardas
item.description: I LOVE LOVE LOVE the Fudge Ritz Crackers I want more !looking all over for them;Please bring them back even having my daughter looking for them out of state
item.content:encoded: I LOVE LOVE LOVE the Fudge Ritz Crackers I want more !looking all over for them;Please bring them back even having my daughter looking for them out of state

item.title: By: Russell Heimlich
item.dc:creator: Russell Heimlich
item.description: I'll try my best, though I'm just a regular guy.
item.content:encoded: I’ll try my best, though I’m just a regular guy.

item.title: By: Sheila Smith
item.dc:creator: Sheila Smith
item.description: I have been looking all over for those fudge covered ritz crackers. I love them my son and i would really like to see you bring those crackers back.
item.content:encoded: I have been looking all over for those fudge covered ritz crackers. I love them my son and i would really like to see you bring those crackers back.

item.title: By: Karen
item.dc:creator: Karen
item.description: PLEASE, make the Fudge Covered Ritz Crackers all year long, I love them, they are a little bit chocolatey and alot of flavor, put peanut butter on them and OMG!!! awesome.. Best snack ever.
item.content:encoded: PLEASE, make the Fudge Covered Ritz Crackers all year long, I love them, they are a little bit chocolatey and alot of flavor, put peanut butter on them and OMG!!! awesome.. Best snack ever.

item.title: By: Lillian
item.dc:creator: Lillian
item.description: I think these crackers with fudge are the greatest idea. On problem was that it was a limited edition box and I have not been able to find them again in any of the markets where I live in Norwood , Massachusetts. They should really be distributed all over this country, they are that great. Hopefully Kraft foods will read all these great reviews and think about putting them on the market as a regular product! I will certain stock up if I can ever find them again somewhere. January 30th, 2011
item.content:encoded:
I think these crackers with fudge are the greatest idea. On problem was that it was a limited edition box and I have not been able to find them again in any of the markets where I live in Norwood , Massachusetts. They should really be distributed all over this country, they are that great. Hopefully Kraft foods will read all these great reviews and think about putting them on the market as a regular product! I will certain stock up if I can ever find them again somewhere.
January 30th, 2011

item.title: By: Norma
item.dc:creator: Norma
item.description: THE RITZ FUDGE COVERED CRACKERS SHOULD NOT BE LIMITED EDITION , THEY SHOULD BE MADE ALL YEAR LONG!!! I LOVE THEM!!! THEY RUN OUT WAY TO FAST!!!
item.content:encoded:
THE RITZ FUDGE COVERED CRACKERS SHOULD NOT BE LIMITED EDITION , THEY SHOULD BE MADE ALL YEAR LONG!!!
I LOVE THEM!!!
THEY RUN OUT WAY TO FAST!!!

item.title: By: Karen
item.dc:creator: Karen
item.description: I just purchased the ritz chocolate covered crackers at the Krogers store in Cols Ohio today 11/27/10 it says for limited time only theres a phone number on the box it says please visit ritzcrackers.com or call weekdays @ 1-800-622-4726 please have box available (upc code on this box is 4400002389 hope this helps
item.content:encoded:
I just purchased the ritz chocolate covered crackers at the Krogers store in Cols Ohio
today 11/27/10 it says for limited time only theres a phone number on the box it says please visit ritzcrackers.com or call weekdays @ 1-800-622-4726 please have box available (upc code on this box is 4400002389 hope this helps
